short_summary: Purchase of four (4) Direct Health Measures Trailers for oral health and laboratory collection
description: The procurement process involves the purchase of four (4) trailers. This solicitation aims to obtain custom 53' trailers for use by Statistics Canada. The desired features of the trailers include:
full_summary:
## Title

Purchase of Four (4) Direct Health Measures Trailers
================================================shots(call end)

## Request for Proposal Announcement

### Solicitation Number

WS4022390909

### Publication Date

June 19, 2023

### Tender Closing Date and Time

August 21, 2023 at 14:00

### Amendments

Amendment 7 was published on August 17, 2023, extending the RFX closing date to August 21, 2023.

### Notice Type and Method

This is a Request for Proposal (DFP) solicitation, open to all eligible contractors. Bidders may submit their proposals using the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNPSPC).

### Goods and Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC) is seeking bids for the purchase of four (4) Direct Health Measures Trailers for oral health and laboratory collection.

### Trade Agreement

This solicitation is open to all eligible contractors with relevant trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Regions of Operation and Delivery

The procurement relates to Ottawa, Ontario, and delivery to Statistics Canada (StatCan).

### Contact Information

*   Contact Name: David Murray (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16627147?extsite=MTY2MjcxNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Deadline for Responses

Tenders are to be submitted electronically via the Ariba platform by August 21, 2023 at 14:00.

### Clarifications and Questions

All questions and inquiries regarding this solicitation are to be directed to the contact person listed above.

### Attachments

None.
